Question.Subject: I cannot open FarmVille game. It sais: Server not found Firefox can't find the server at fb-1.farmville.com.?
Question.Content: I haven't play it too much today since I couldn't open it at all for hours now...I tried to open with safari and firefox and also tried to play it from farmville.com. None of them worked..
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You've probably played too much Farmville today.
But the error means that Facebook or Zynga, or your ISP, is having some sort of issue. Try again in a few minutes.

Answer.Content:
You've probably played too much Farmville today.
But the error means that Facebook or Zynga, or your ISP, is having some sort of issue. Try again in a few minutes.
